description:
Provides a security group resource.

-> **NOTE:** `alicloud_security_group` is used to build and manage a security group, and `alicloud_security_group_rule` can define ingress or egress rules for it.

-> **NOTE:** From version 1.7.2, `alicloud_security_group` has supported to segregate different ECS instance in which the same security group.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Description.description: The security group description. Defaults to null.

InnerAccess.description: Field 'inner_access' has been deprecated from provider version 1.55.3. Use 'inner_access_policy' replaces it.

InnerAccessPolicy.description: Whether to allow both machines to access each other on all ports in the same security group. Valid values: ["Accept", "Drop"].

Name.description: The name of the security group. Defaults to null.

ResourceGroupId.description: The Id of resource group which the security_group belongs.

SecurityGroupType.description:
The type of the security group. Valid values:
`normal`: basic security group.
`enterprise`: advanced security group For more information.

Tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.
